page.title: 20Conclusion.
page.content: The children of both schools have greatly enjoyed finding out about the area in which they live.It is a varied district near the Downs, the sea and large towns.It is an old town and much of its heritage has been kept. It is a successful commercial port and pleasant residential area. It is, however, a changing town with an expanding population served by an airport, railway and major roads. The increase in traffic has meant that the Norfolk Bridge over the Adur, has had to be replaced and work is currently taking place.
